messages.subject: commercial message: some tsubas
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I have some non mantis items, I need to move to get more mantis items.  already couldn t bid on the tsuba on ebay and I already missed it on yahoo.jp.
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

Ken aka "the Mantis Dude" Wilson
